name: NIBELUNGEN SAGA (Canceled)
blurb: The game based on the ancient legend that inspired \u201cLord of the Rings\u201d and many other fantasy stories.

rewards.reward: VIP ACCESS\r\n==============================\r\nYou get VIP access to the GAME WEBSITE where you can participate in discussion forums, contribute ideas, talk to the developers, and follow project progress on our blog. (Only available for project backers!)
FREE GAME DOWNLOAD\r\n==============================\r\nYou can download the game for FREE. (This low price only available for project backers!) Also includes VIP access.
EARLY BIRD\r\n==============================\r\nSame benefits as the $50 reward, but at a lower price for the pioneering very first backers!

FULL DIGITAL PACKAGE\r\n==============================\r\nYou get early access to the ALPHA and BETA versions of the game. You also get to download the awesome game SOUNDTRACK as MP3, a beautiful digital BOOK with concept artworks, and exclusive digital WALLPAPERS featuring the main characters and villains from the game. Also includes VIP access and free download of the game.

BOXED EDITION + T-SHIRT\r\n==============================\r\nYou get the exclusive BOXED EDITION of the game for PC and Mac (not available through retail), plus a special T-SHIRT available only for project backers. Also includes VIP access, digital edition of the game, plus all the downloadable items.

THOR'S HAMMER + IMMORTALITY\r\n============================== In the game, your name will be engraved on the great door to VALHALLA, the hall of the immortal warriors, for all eternity! You also get a real hand-crafted AMULET symbolizing the hammer of Thor to demonstrate your heathen disposition. Also includes VIP access, t-shirt, boxed and digital editions of the game, plus all downloadable items.

RUNESTONE\r\n==============================\r\nA mighty RUNESTONE is erected in the game world to your honor, with your name on it in runic letters! You also get a beautifully crafted MINIATURE version of your runestone mailed to you. Also includes VIP access, t-shirt, boxed and digital editions of the game, plus all downloadable items.

ORIGINAL ARTWORK ============================== You get a beautiful piece of concept art, framed and hand-signed by our artist. Each artwork is unique and will be a worthy addition to your art collection. Also includes VIP access, t-shirt, boxed and digital editions of the game, plus all downloadable items.

THE RING ANDVARANAUT\r\n==============================\r\nThe legendary MAGICAL RING that can alter the appearance of his bearer, and even make him invisible! The ring was hand-crafted by the dwarf Andvari and is made of pure silver. No warranty given on the invisibility feature. Also includes VIP access, t-shirt, boxed and digital editions of the game, and all downloadable items.

FEAST AT ODIN'S COURT\r\n==============================\r\nIn the game, a skalde (viking bard) will sing a SONG to your praise. You also get to feast with the developer team at our official RELEASE PARTY, to be held in the medieval town of Xanten, according to legend the actual birthplace of our hero Sigvard. This also includes a WEEKEND TRIP with our team visiting cool historical sites and ancient castles in northern Europe. We provide food, mead and lodging, flight is on you. Also includes VIP access, t-shirt, boxed and digital editions of the game, plus all downloadable items.
